description:
11.8 backgroundkey
Turns a static background into transparency.

The filter accepts the following option:

blend.description: Set the blend amount for pixels that are not similar.

name: backgroundkey

parameters.description: Set the blend amount for pixels that are not similar.
parameters.name: blend

source:
11.8 backgroundkey

Turns a static background into transparency.

The filter accepts the following option:

threshold

Threshold for scene change detection.

similarity

Similarity percentage with the background.

blend

Set the blend amount for pixels that are not similar.
